entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
